description: This file defines data classes and enums related to the response events and their serialization/deserialization in a backend API, specifically for handling run responses, events, and associated metadata in a system that processes media and reasoning steps.

classes.name: BaseRunResponseEvent
classes.description: A data class representing a response event with methods for converting to dict and JSON, handling various media and metadata attributes.

classes.name: RunResponseExtraData
classes.description: A data class encapsulating additional data related to run responses, including messages, reasoning steps, and references.

classes.name: RunStatus
classes.description: An enumeration representing the state of a run response, such as running, paused, canceled, or error.

methods.name: to_dict
methods.description: Serializes the response event to a dictionary, including handling nested media artifacts and optional fields.

methods.name: to_json
methods.description: Converts the response event to a JSON string.

methods.name: from_dict
methods.description: Creates an instance of the class from a dictionary, validating and converting nested media artifacts and other complex fields.
